column2: Local point of reference within SCBI_ForestGEO plot, correspond to quadrat.
The cardinal direction designation of a given seedling plot in reference to Stake
True= seedling plot inside deer exclosure, FALSE= seedling plot outside deer exclosure
Species acronym used in the field
Any field note, also coded information.
Species acronym for invasive species sp. 1
Percentage cover of invasive species sp. 1

Percentage cover of invasive species sp. 2

Seedling found dead (or no physical evidence of it), tag removed from field.
NA is applied in column 'height" when there the code 'D,TR' was given in a previous year
New seedling found in a particular year, either they get a tag number or not. A new tag was given if plant height >10 cm.
No plant and not tag found during survey. Presumed dead.
Not plant, not tag found, you cannot have this code if the seedling didn’t have a tag before.
